programmes.show_description: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.
Tune in to see Dyson's ground-breaking Supersonic hairdryer and Airwrap styling tool. Discover how quick and quiet drying or styling your hair can be with these intelligent tools.
Discover the perfect formulas for sensitive skin from the Pai range and explore more from our expert Alison Young.
Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.
Indulge yourself with pampering beauty products, including make-up, skincare and more, featuring iconic British botanical beauty brand, Liz Earle.
Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.
Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.
Transform your tresses with Michael Van Clarke's expert haircare. Achieve strong, vibrant, A-lister hair that shines. Say farewell to bad hair days!
Look after yourself with our showcase of exercise equipment, supplements, meal plans and other tools to help you maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.
Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.
This spring, rely on our skin saviours from the experts at Elemis! World-renowned for incredible skincare, Elemis will help get the very best out of your complexion, whatever your skin type or need.
Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.
Indulge in The Beauty Ritual with Decléor. Discover expert skincare and luxurious formulas to transform your daily routine into a pampering experience. Reveal your radiant glow!
Beauty Tools at 2pm.
Discover Biotech Beauty hosted by Alison Young and learn how science can help you unlock your radiance. With experts Oskia, as well as NAD+ formulas from Pai and more, you won't want to miss it!

Nakery Beauty delivers clean, high-performance skincare and bodycare designed to empower confidence at every age.

Discover Wellbeing Heroes - top picks to help you feel your best every day. Explore essentials for mind, body, and soul, and boost your daily wellness routine!
Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.
Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.
Beauty advice from a leading skincare expert. Howard Murad has years of experience helping people with problems such as breakouts and wrinkles. Tune in to find out how his products can help you.

Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.
